law.text: All warrants heretofore or hereafter issued by the state, whether the date of maturity is fixed or not, are negotiable instruments. No warrant shall be subject to taxation by the state or any subdivision thereof.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4688a-8.
